summary: Vivian L. McPherson was an employee of the U.S. House of Representatives Select Committee on Assassinations (HSCA). Her name appears in multiple payroll certifications and payroll records from the HSCA. These documents span from October 1976 to December 1977 and June 1978, indicating her employment with the committee during that period. The payroll records include details such as salary adjustments and leave records, suggesting she held a standard staff position within the HSCA.
